entities.name: roger davies
entities.description: Roger Davies is described as watching someone talk with a dazed look on his face and missing his mouth with his fork.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having an impression that Roger Davies was too busy staring at Fleur to take in what the word she was saying meant.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as being stared at by Roger Davies and imitated by Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as sitting at a staff table in his horrible hairy brown suit and gazing up at the top table.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is described as returning Hagrid's wave and having her opals glittering in the candlelight.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as teaching Viktor Krum to say her name properly.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as being taught by Hermione to say her name properly.

relationships.description: Harry imitated Fleur by slapping his own hand down on the table.
Hagrid was gazing up at Madame Maxime.
Hagrid was also gazing up at Fleur.
Hermione was teaching Viktor Krum to say her name properly.
